title: I can't choose a champion at champion selecting!
body:
I try to click on the champing that i wanna choose, but it gives an error message, that I **CAN'T CHOOSE A CHAMPING RIGHT NOW!**

Please help!

Lots of thanks from: **SrentoGamer**

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be playing in Draft Mode where players take turns picking their champions. Once the players in front of you have banned and picked their champs, you'll be able to lock-in yours. 

If that's not the case, there might be an issue with your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) preventing you from having a strong enough connection to lock-in your champion. Try adjusting some of those settings using the steps in that network guide, and let me know if that helps!
